data.name: FreePeriod11_2
data.value: To continue using the "Microarea Live Update" service to make sure you keep your product constantly on track with the latest innovations, please subscribe to the service as soon as possible; you can pay for it in the terms and conditions that best suit you.{2} To subscribe for the "Microarea Live Update" contract {0} go to our website {1} and enter your ID (user name and password) to access: you can securely subscribe and check your information. If you do not have access ID, you can get these by registering online; follow the guided procedure in the site.

data.name: Instalment12_2
data.value: The transaction will enable you to continue using the service and keep your product constantly on track with the latest innovations for the next {3} months without any suspension.{2} To make the payment {0} go to our website {1} and enter your ID (user name and password) to access: you can securely subscribe and check your information.
